messages.message:
Hi all!
I’m going to be upgrading the dogfood GKE cluster this weekend, likely Saturday morning. This window should avoid impacting most devs, I hope. :slightly_smiling_face:

This upgrade will bring us into better compliance with both our and GCP’s security and compliance postures, as well as reducing variables that may be contributing to dogfood’s instability and unpredictability.

Let me know if you have any questions or concerns!
